# Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

Search: id:a014767
Showing 1-1 of 1

%I A014767
%S A014767 1,2,6,12,60,120,5040,32,181440,3628800,39916800,95040,3113510400,
%T A014767 87178291200,1307674368000,80,177843714048000,6402373705728000,
%U A014767 121645100408832000,1216451004088320000,25545471085854720000
%N A014767 Order of shuffle group on n cards {0..n-1} generated by i->n-1-i and i->min{2i,2n-1-2i}.
%D A014767 J. H. Conway and N. J. A. Sloane, "Sphere Packings, Lattices and Groups", Springer-Verlag, p. 323.
%o A014767 (MAGMA) S := function(n) G := Sym({0..n-1}); p := &*[ G | (i, n-1-i) : i in [ 0..Floor((n-2)/2) ] ];
%o A014767 q := G![ Min(2*i,2*n-1-2*i):i in [ 0..n-1 ] ]; return Order(sub<G | p, q >); end function;
%K A014767 nonn,easy,nice
%O A014767 1,2
%A A014767 _N. J. A. Sloane_.
